segments.advisor_message: Alright, so, um, do you have, like, the name of the dependent? Just to make sure we're on the same page here?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it's Alex, um, but... wait, oh! I think I forgot to mention the, uh, their birthday too?

segments.advisor_message: Right, right, yeah, that helps! Could you also tell me their date of birth?
segments.client_message: Oh, sure, it's, um, 15th of May, uh, Twenty... oh, no! I mean 2015, sorry!

segments.advisor_message: No worries, that's good. And, um, until when are they, like, considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Uh, I guess until they turn, um, 18? So that, like, would be 15-05-2033?
